title: How to Make Carrot and Coconut Sambal

steps.headline: Heat the vegetable oil in the pan.
Add the mustard seeds and coconut to the pan.
steps.description: Cook until the coconut begins to brown. Stir constantly during cooking.

steps.headline: Combine the cooked mixture with the remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix together well.

text: Heat the vegetable oil in the pan.  Add the mustard seeds and coconut to the pan. Cook until the coconut begins to brown. Stir constantly during cooking. Combine the cooked mixture with the remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix together well.  Transfer to a serving bowl.  Finished.
